price: Má ṣe kọ párìkẹ́ rẹ sí ènìyàn. Má sì ṣe rìn lórí ilẹ̀ pẹ̀lú fáàrí. Dájúdájú Allāhu kò fẹ́ràn gbogbo onígbèéraga, onífáàrí.
arabic: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṣaʿʿir khaddaka lilnnāsi walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla mukh'tālin fakhūrin
